solution_line_template: Since Guise was eating {daily_increase} more hot dogs each day than the previous day and ate {monday_hot_dogs} hot dogs on Monday, he ate {monday_hot_dogs}+{daily_increase} = <<{monday_hot_dogs}+{daily_increase}={tuesday_hot_dogs}>>{tuesday_hot_dogs} hot dogs on Tuesday.
By Tuesday Guise had eaten {tuesday_hot_dogs}+{monday_hot_dogs} = <<{tuesday_hot_dogs}+{monday_hot_dogs}={tuesday_total}>>{tuesday_total} hot dogs.

On Wednesday, after eating two more hot dogs than the previous day, the total number of hot dogs he ate is {tuesday_hot_dogs}+{daily_increase} = <<{tuesday_hot_dogs}+{daily_increase}={wednesday_hot_dogs}>>{wednesday_hot_dogs}
In the three days, Guise ate {wednesday_hot_dogs}+{tuesday_total} = <<{wednesday_hot_dogs}+{tuesday_total}={total_by_wednesday}>>{total_by_wednesday} hotdogs.
